name: Unlevel
description:
I do recommend to play the desktop version if you can (It's a tiny download) because the Löve web player is experimental so there is a color issue and some sound problem. But hey, the web version is there so you do you what you want.

Unlevel is small puzzley platformer where you control a cute little penguin. They cannot do much except going left and right, but you can tilt the level to help them reach new heights.

Have Fun!  🎉

Controls:

  • Left, Right arrows to move
  • Spacebar to tilt the level

Bonus controls:

  • ‘r’ to restart the current level
  • ‘n’ to go to the next level
  • backspace to return to the title screen
  • ‘e’ to toggle shader
